content: Quick question: Is it ok to add new unstable methods (or API in general) to already existing unstable features? Or rather create a new feature name? Context is this, in case you're interested: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/75019#discussion_r467583396
from what I know this is fine and iirc have already seen this a few times before, not part of t-libs though
Yes it's fine. You can make any changes you want to an unstable feature. The only case where you need to be careful is when that feature is already in FCP.
